originalText.text: To anyone who is considering hiring Rohesia, I recently updated my professional website with Rohesia’s assistance and am writing this review to share my extremely positive experience. Rohesia brought a lot of technical know-how and intuition to the process and began by listening attentively to my goals for the site. She then provided clear guidance about options and pricing and made it so easy to work with her as she was very responsive to my comments and requests. Rohesia provided helpful feedback throughout the process, and brought an artistic and creative sensibility to the website design. I highly recommend hiring Rohesia for your web design projects. Thanks Rohesia! Peter

originalText.text: Rohesia did an amazing job bringing my vision to life! She was such a pleasure to work with and I highly recommend her services.

text.text: Rohesia did an amazing job bringing my vision to life! She was such a pleasure to work with and I highly recommend her services.

originalText.text: I had such a wonderfully positive experience working with Hamiltro Website Design. They absolutely exceeded my expectations. The process was actually quite painless. Rohesia helped me organize my thoughts and decide upon a theme for my website within the context of a 60-minute consultation session. She was incredibly responsive to my feedback and seemed to have an intuitive sense of what design I wanted (even when I did not have the awareness). I would absolutely recommend her to anyone looking for a professional website that reflects them authentically. She is also just a really wonderful person and lovely to talk to.

text.text: I had such a wonderfully positive experience working with Hamiltro Website Design. They absolutely exceeded my expectations. The process was actually quite painless. Rohesia helped me organize my thoughts and decide upon a theme for my website within the context of a 60-minute consultation session. She was incredibly responsive to my feedback and seemed to have an intuitive sense of what design I wanted (even when I did not have the awareness). originalText.text:
Hamiltro implemented a very complicated eCommerce site for me and did an amazing job. At the start, the project did not seem terribly complicated, but I became that nightmare client and added all kinds of complexities, including many different categories of products and levels of discounts. Because of the added complexities, implementation of the eCommerce aspect posed a number of challenges and obstacles. But the Hamiltro staff was extremely responsive and, above all, calm in the face of the unexpected.

My site is beautiful and functioning magnificently. It has occasionally experienced the unavoidable glitches but the Hamiltro team is always available and responsive. I recommend Hamiltro to anyone who wants a sophisticated and savvy web design firm. I plan to continue working with Hamiltro as enhancements are added to the site. I am an extremely pleased client.

originalText.text: Loved working with Rohesia! She was a fantastic communicator and very efficient in making edits and changes. I came to Rohesia with a very impact-driven organization and she not only provided consultation as a professional web designer but also as a user. That was very valuable to me because it helped develop a great strategy in how to think about our website and what we present. I'd highly recommend Rohesia for your next web design & development project.
